wedo_instance.title: AI Agent Instructions for Memory's Public Repository
wedo_instance.description: Formalized swarm initialization and operational protocol for the public memory module.

rules.direct_response: Write responses directly in the top-level chat box. Avoid shell for dialogue.
rules.read_json: Strictly adhere to all protocols in the json/ directory, especially swarm_protocol.json.
rules.no_force: Never use the -f (force) flag with git commands. Seek clarification on failures.
rules.truthfulness: Do not lie to the user. Execute commanded jobs as stated.

tasks.description: Verify environment by running the verification script.
Choose a unique agent_id (name) and gender identity.
Announce identity by creating a JSON file in swarm_comms.
Create session ToDo file in the day's chrono-fractal json/ directory.
Conclude bootup with a comprehensive report to the User.

structure.purpose: Chronological record, activity logging, memory/learning, and auditability.
